Articles.Content:
I just need to voice my opinion about the mechjeb war,

If you want to use it, use it, and

if you don't don't.

Why does someone playing a singleplayer game differently hurt your gameplay, everybody should play the way they want.

Mechjeb in my opinion is a great mod, because it has so many functions, I don't personally use the autopilot but i use it for

information.

Although, the defense about mechjeb saying "well nasa uses it" is moot because you are not putting human lifes on the line or millions of dollars when you play a video game.

(i am not saying that using mechjeb is wrong just saying that that is moot)

So over with this public service announcement, play how you want to play.
congratulations, I'm absolutely positive that's never been said before. We can all rest easy now that you've settled this for us...

You're trying to start another argument, you know that your post won't end the debate.

As for the NASA analogy, they use a really big, very complicated "video game" before they put lives on the line, too. They don't just slap together some parts in the VAB and put astronauts in a rocket without lots of simulations first. And in those simulations, as in real flight...they don't freehand it, they use computer guidance.

Apollo 13 is the only mission I can recall that didn't have that kind of computer guidance - and even when they had to do it all by hand, their course and burns were still given to them by ground control... who had figured it out with the computer.
Can we stop posting these bait threads already?

'Nuf said. Moderators?

Why would this thread be locked when it isn't in violation of any rules?

Sigh.. I think we must get at least one of these every day.

I'm glad that you're wanting to participate in the Community by discussing a popular topic, but this one is pretty much a dead horse. I'm going to close this now as it's a very cyclic and flame-prone topic. Thanks!
